sentences.sContent: But for a stroll in the park, no water bottle is necessary.
sentences.sContent_eng: But for a stroll in the park, no water bottle is necessary.
sentences.sCn: 但对于在公园里散步，携带水瓶是没有必要的。

sentences.sContent: Of course make sure your water bottle is healthy and not loaded with chemicals and toxins.
sentences.sContent_eng: Of course make sure your water bottle is healthy and not loaded with chemicals and toxins.
sentences.sCn: 理所当然地，要确保你装水的瓶子清洁不带有任何化学和有毒物质。

sentences.sContent: He had no idea where he was, although, at one point, heapparently glimpsed Polish writing on a water bottle.
sentences.sContent_eng: He had no idea where he was, although, at one point, heapparently glimpsed Polish writing on a water bottle.
sentences.sCn: 他不确定自己在哪里，尽管有一次他很清楚的瞥见一个水瓶上印着波兰文。

trans.tranOther: a bottle used for carrying water to drink
